metadata.feature_description: Compare different versions of content with visual diff highlighting

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Access Page History and Compare Two Versions

steps.expected: Login succeeds and user is authenticated
steps.actual: Login successful, SuperUser Account displayed in header

steps.action: Enter Edit Mode by clicking Edit in Persona Bar
steps.expected: Page enters Edit Mode with Edit Bar visible at bottom
steps.actual: Edit Mode activated, Edit Bar with icons visible at bottom of page

steps.action: Click Page History button in Edit Bar
steps.expected: Page History panel opens showing version list
steps.actual: Page History panel opened showing table with COMPARE, VERSION, DATE, USER, STATE, ACTIONS columns and multiple versions listed

steps.action: Select two versions by clicking Compare checkboxes
steps.expected: Both checkboxes become checked and Compare button becomes enabled
steps.actual: Version 3 (Draft) and Version 2 (Published) checkboxes selected, Compare button enabled

steps.action: Click Compare button to initiate version comparison
steps.expected: Comparison view opens showing side-by-side diff with visual highlighting
steps.actual: Side-by-side comparison view displayed with Version 3 and Version 2, showing 'Inserted' (cyan) and 'Deleted' (red) legend for visual diff highlighting

observations: The Content Comparison feature is implemented at the PAGE level through Page History in the Edit Bar, not at the individual HTML module level as suggested by the UI location in the feature description
The comparison uses HtmlDiff.dll to generate visual diffs between page versions
When page state changes during comparison (e.g., from another user action), a conflict dialog appears informing the user to refresh
The visual diff uses CSS styling: insertions are highlighted with green/cyan background, deletions with red/pink background
Synchronized scrolling is implemented between the two version iframes for easy comparison
The feature requires at least two page versions to be available for comparison to work
